name: Attack of the Movies 3-D
overview: Attack of the Movies 3-D is a rail shooter for the Xbox 360 and Nintendo Wii video game consoles The Wii version of the game is the first 3-D shooter designed for the console. The game transport gamers into six movie-themed worlds will they will battle large alien space cruisers, shoots underwater monsters and more, only to discover the reason why these movies come to life.
